source/blog.title: down. translated.
source/blog.body:
down. translated. is the personal blog of @aetherised. here you will find musings, sketches, works in progress and other miscellanae of interest to no one at all. it's a blog, after all.

@aetherised also runs a somewhat more respectable blog, "the neomodernist", as a currated collection of artifacts and commentary from antiquity to the late modern period — please visit.

source/majestic.title: Majestic
source/majestic.body: Majestic is a comic about the final years of the galactic Canonite Empire, some 120 millenia from now.
